plot: When their professional lives become a joke, four friends devise a way to earn money by dressing up as their favorite jokes and acting them out in public.
plot_en: When their professional lives become a joke, four friends devise a way to earn money by dressing up as their favorite jokes and acting them out in public.
plot_es: When their professional lives become a joke, four friends devise a way to earn money by dressing up as their favorite jokes and acting them out in public.
title: Funny Boned
